Title: Guard with jstestdriver
Description:
Using jstestdriver is kind of involved:
- first you need to start a server
- then you (optionally) capture a server
- then you could use jsautotest, but new files wouldn't be picked up
- feedback in one of those many terminal windows

This cast demonstrates Guard with the Guard-jstd plugin, with notifications in both:
- the terminal
- the desktop (notify-send)
- colorizing my Emacs window

Awesome!
